Label: SC_PREMIUM_RATE
Comment: "Prefix 88 is not included here as it inconsistent in the doc provided by www.gra.gi.\nHence we will continue to treat it as 8 digit premiumRate number in\nPhoneNumberMetadata.xml unless we hear otherwise."
